description: Styles for the Tetris game frontend, including layout, colors, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: tetrisRoot
classes.description: Main container for the game with a full viewport height and a linear gradient background.

classes.name: headerBar
classes.description: Styles for the header bar of the game, providing layout for logos and titles.

classes.name: logo
classes.description: Styling for the game's logo element, including font size, weight, and color.

classes.name: subtitle
classes.description: Styling for the subtitle beneath the logo, including margin and color.

classes.name: mainLayout
classes.description: Layout for the main game area, supports column and row layouts with spacing and shadows.

classes.name: leftPanel
classes.description: Styling for the left panel containing game controls or information.

classes.name: pausedOverlay
classes.description: Overlay shown when the game is paused, centrally aligned with styling for text and background.

classes.name: gameOverOverlay
classes.description: Overlay displayed when the game is over, including text and visual effects.

classes.name: finalScore
classes.description: Styling for displaying the final score after game ends.

classes.name: restartHint
classes.description: Hint for players to restart the game, with specific font size and color.

classes.name: footer
classes.description: Styling for the footer element, containing various information about the game.
